searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT RCDATA.ELOANCODE, RCDATA.RISKTYPE, RCDATA.ELOANPKID, RCDATA.SERVICECODE, RCDATA.FINORGCODE, RCDATA.CUSTOMERNAME, RCDATA.EXECUTORID, RCDATA.EXECUTORTEAMID, RCDATA.EXECUTORDISTID, RCDATA.EXETIME, RCDATA.RCEXEID AS RCEXEIDSTR FROM (SELECT RCCITEM.ECODE AS ELOANCODE, RCCITEM.RTYPE AS RISKTYPE, RCCITEM.EPKID AS ELOANPKID, RCCITEM.SRVCODE AS SERVICECODE, RCCITEM.FOCODE AS FINORGCODE, RCCITEM.CNAME AS CUSTOMERNAME, RCCITEM.EXEID AS EXECUTORID, RCCITEM.EXETEAM AS EXECUTORTEAMID, RCCITEM.EXEDIST AS EXECUTORDISTID, RCMGC.CREATE_TIME AS EXETIME, RCMGC.CREATE_BY AS RCEXEID FROM (SELECT RCC.ELOAN_CODE AS ECODE, RCC.RISK_TYPE AS RTYPE, RCC.PKID AS RCID, ELOAN.PKID AS EPKID, ELOAN.LOAN_SRV_CODE AS SRVCODE, ELOAN.FIN_ORG_CODE AS FOCODE, ELOAN.CUST_NAME AS CNAME, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_ID AS EXEID, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_TEAM AS EXETEAM, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_DISTRICT AS EXEDIST FROM sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_RC_RISK_CONTROL AS RCC JOIN sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE AS ELOAN ON RCC.ELOAN_CODE = ELOAN.ELOAN_CODE) AS RCCITEM JOIN sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_TO_RC_MORTGAGE_CARD AS RCMGC ON RCCITEM.RCID = RCMGC.RC_ID
UNION
SELECT RCCITEM.ECODE AS ELOANCODE, RCCITEM.RTYPE AS RISKTYPE, RCCITEM.EPKID AS ELOANPKID, RCCITEM.SRVCODE AS SERVICECODE, RCCITEM.FOCODE AS FINORGCODE, RCCITEM.CNAME AS CUSTOMERNAME, RCCITEM.EXEID AS EXECUTORID, RCCITEM.EXETEAM AS EXECUTORTEAMID, RCCITEM.EXEDIST AS EXECUTORDISTID, RCFR.EXECUTE_TIME AS EXETIME, RCFR.CREATE_BY AS RCEXEID FROM (SELECT RCC.ELOAN_CODE AS ECODE, RCC.RISK_TYPE AS RTYPE, RCC.PKID AS RCID, ELOAN.PKID AS EPKID, ELOAN.LOAN_SRV_CODE AS SRVCODE, ELOAN.FIN_ORG_CODE AS FOCODE, ELOAN.CUST_NAME AS CNAME, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_ID AS EXEID, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_TEAM AS EXETEAM, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_DISTRICT AS EXEDIST FROM sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_RC_RISK_CONTROL AS RCC JOIN sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE AS ELOAN ON RCC.ELOAN_CODE = ELOAN.ELOAN_CODE) AS RCCITEM JOIN sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_TO_RC_FORCE_REGISTER AS RCFR ON RCCITEM.RCID = RCFR.RC_ID
UNION
SELECT RCCITEM.ECODE AS ELOANCODE, RCCITEM.RTYPE AS RISKTYPE, RCCITEM.EPKID AS ELOANPKID, RCCITEM.SRVCODE AS SERVICECODE, RCCITEM.FOCODE AS FINORGCODE, RCCITEM.CNAME AS CUSTOMERNAME, RCCITEM.EXEID AS EXECUTORID, RCCITEM.EXETEAM AS EXECUTORTEAMID, RCCITEM.EXEDIST AS EXECUTORDISTID, RCMG.CREATE_TIME AS EXETIME, RCMG.CREATE_BY AS RCEXEID FROM (SELECT RCC.ELOAN_CODE AS ECODE, RCC.RISK_TYPE AS RTYPE, RCC.PKID AS RCID, ELOAN.PKID AS EPKID, ELOAN.LOAN_SRV_CODE AS SRVCODE, ELOAN.FIN_ORG_CODE AS FOCODE, ELOAN.CUST_NAME AS CNAME, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_ID AS EXEID, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_TEAM AS EXETEAM, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_DISTRICT AS EXEDIST FROM sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_RC_RISK_CONTROL AS RCC JOIN sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE AS ELOAN ON RCC.ELOAN_CODE = ELOAN.ELOAN_CODE) AS RCCITEM JOIN sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_TO_RC_MORTGAGE AS RCMG ON RCCITEM.RCID = RCMG.RC_ID) AS RCDATA
WHERE 1=1
<choose> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='GeneralManager' "> AND 1=1 </when> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='director' "> AND RCDATA.EXECUTORDISTID = #orgId# </when> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='Manager' "> AND RCDATA.EXECUTORTEAMID = #orgId# </when> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='consultant' "> AND RCDATA.EXECUTORID = #userId# </when> <otherwise> AND 1=0 </otherwise> </choose>
